translations.translation: Need help with your private databases?
The server is in an idle state. Some features are therefore disabled.
The server is being migrated. Some features are therefore disabled.
You are not the database administrator.
Le certificat n'est pas obligatoire pour réaliser la connexion à votre instance. Celui-ci est par contre nécessaire si vous désirez chiffrer la connexion vers celle-ci.
Refer to the users and rights tab
Careful! Any change will cause the server to restart.
The configuration is being changed. Your server will restart.
An error occurred when modifying the configuration.
Your server has restarted and the configuration was successful.
Defines whether or not auto-commit mode is enabled i.e. if requests have automatically been committed or if they have to be committed in order to work.
Maximum number of authorised simultaneous connections on the server.
Disable the use of InnoDB tables.
This is a directory of temporary files. /dev/shm refers to RAM storage for extra performance, whereas /tmp refers to hard disk storage (recommended for occasional resource-intensive transactions).
The number of seconds of inactivity during a command line connection, after which the server closes the connection.
The number of seconds of inactivity during an external connection, after which the server closes the connection.
Cette fonctionnalité n'est pas disponible pour ce type de base de données.
Authorisation of the following queries : Select / Insert / Update / Delete / Create / Alter / Drop
Authorisation of the following query: Select
Authorisation of the following queries: Select / Insert / Update / Delete
You do not have a database
You cannot change the rights of a user who is being deleted.
The deletion request has been successful.
An error occurred during the deletion request.
Error during the modification of rights.
The rights have been successfully modified.
The modification will be effective in a few minutes.
The password does not conform to our security rules.
The addition of a user has been registered and will soon be effective.
An error occurred during the addition of a user

Private SQL is only compatible with web hosting packages based in the same datacentre, such as the one selected. If you would like to use another web hosting package in your account, or a different web hosting package and you don't know which datacentre it is based in, you can find this information in the "general information" tab of this hosting package.
Private SQL should be installed in the same datacentre as the hosting package

Private SQL is only compatible with hosting services in the same datacentre. If you have a hosting package on another account and you do not know which datacentre it is in, log in to this other account to find out the datacentre from your hosting package's "general information" tab.
Please note, CloudDB is not compatible with OVH web hosting packages.

Attention! The password must conform to the following conditions:
- Minimum {0} characters
- Maximum {1} characters
- At least one upper-case letter
- At least one lower-case letter
- At least one number
- Must contain only numbers and letters.
The format of the password is incorrect.
The password change request will be effective in a few minutes.
An error occured when requesting a password change.

Attention! The password must conform to the following conditions:
- Minimum {0} characters
- Maximum {1} characters
- At least one upper-case letter
- At least one lower-case letter
- At least one number
- Must contain only numbers and letters.

Please note: the name must respect the following criteria:
- Minimum {0} characters
- Maximum {1} characters
- Should only contain figures and letters.
- May contain these characters: "-", "_", "."
The format of the password is incorrect.
The password change request will be effective in a few minutes.
An error occured when requesting a password change.
The password has been changed successfully.
Which version would you like to migrate your server to? Current: {0}.
An error occurred when searching for available versions.
Please confirm the migration of your Private SQL: {0} to version {1}.
As a security measure, we recommend that you do a backup of all your databases before this migration.
Warning! This migration will cause the Private SQL to reboot.
The request to migrate your server will be registered in a few moments.
An error occurred during the request to migrate your server.
You have no other versions available.
You are going to synchonise the data with your server.
The request to synchronise your data with your server will be registered in a few moments.
An error occurred during the request to synchronise your data.
You are going to reboot your server.
The request to reboot your server will be registered in a few moments.
An error occurred during the request to reboot your server.
You are going to start up your server.
The request to start up your server will be registered in a few moments.
An error occurred during the request to start up your server.
You are going to turn off your server.
The request to turn off your server will be registered in a few moments.
An error occurred during the request to turn off your server.
Your server has been successfully migrated.
Your server has successfully started up.
Your server has been successfully turned off.
Your server has been successfully rebooted.
Your password has been changed successfully.
Your password has been changed successfully.
Your data has been successfully synchronised with your server.
An error occurred during the migration of your server.
An error occurred when your server was starting up.
An error occurred when your server was turning off.
An error occurred when your server was rebooting.
An error occurred during the password modification.
An error occurred during the password modification.
An error occurred when your data was being synchronised with your server.
No backups of your databases deleted within the last 30 days
Confirm the deletion of the database: {0}
The deletion of the database has been registered.
An error occurred during the deletion of the database.
An error occurred when backing up the database.
The name does not conform to the rules.

Please note: the name must conform to the following conditions:
- Minimum {0} characters
- Maximum {1} characters
- Must contain only numbers and letters.
The database creation request has been registered.
An error occured during the creation of the database.
Between 8 and 31 characters, at least one upper-case letter, one lower-case letter and a number, it must only be made up of numbers and letters
Vous n'avez pas encore d'adresse IP autorisée à accéder à vos bases de données. Entrez ici l'adresse IP du serveur auquel vous souhaitez donner accès à vos bases.
Accès initial à la base de données
First recreate this in the database management tab.
Do you want to restore the {0} backup for the {1} database?
There was an error when loading.
An error occurred during the backup restore. This error may have occurred because the database does not exist, or because no users have the required rights.
You can only restore an existing database.
A database with the same name already exists. If you decide to continue with the restore, the contents of this database will be deleted and replaced with the chosen backup.
Database backups deleted over the last {0} days
No backup has been created for this database.
An error occured when recovering the list of backups.
An error occurred when restoring the backup:
Souhaitez-vous supprimer la sauvegarde du {0} de la base de données {1} ?
La demande de suppression de la sauvegarde de base de données a été prise en compte.
La suppression de la sauvegarde de base de données a été effectuée.
Une erreur est survenue lors de la suppression de la sauvegarde de base de données.
An error has occurred whilst loading the data.
You do not have any users for this database
An error occurred when searching for available databases.
An error occurred when searching for available durations.
An error occurred when searching for available prices for this duration.
I confirm that I have read and fully understood the terms and conditions.
Click on "Generate purchase order" to order your private database server.
Please read and confirm the terms and conditions below, then click on "Generate the purchase order":
To confirm your order please click the "Pay" button below.
A new tab will open and you will automatically be redirected to the OVH payment interface.
An error occurred during the generation of a purchase order.
The amount of RAM selected will replace the current amount.
The modification will be effective once payment is received.
This will cause the server to restart.
Votre bon de commande a été généré avec succès. La quantité de RAM sera modifiée lorsque vous l'aurez validé.
Error when creating the order confirmation.
The name must not exceed 250 characters.
Do you really want to delete the next scheduled backup?
The planned backup will be deleted.
An error occured when deleting the planned backup.
The Start SQL solution is not available without a web hosting package.
You must have a hosting package in order to get Private SQL and Start SQL options.
CloudDB needs a service which has access to the public network/internet.
Which database service do you want?
Database size from 100 MB to 800 MB
MySQL 5.5 or 5.6 depending on the datacentre
Maximum of 30 simultaneous connections per database
Warning: same size database packs cannot be combined. If you already have an SQL pack of the same size for this domain, the new pack will replace the old one.
256 MB to 2 GB of RAM guaranteed
Only accessible from your OVH web hosting
Guaranteed disk from 4 GB to 32 GB
Only accessible from the public network
256 MB to 2 GB of RAM guaranteed
Guaranteed disk from 4 GB to 32 GB
Service included in your {1} solution. To activate it, go to the general information tab.
How long do you want to use it for?
I have read and accept the following contracts:
The purchase order has been generated.
You will be redirected to the OVH payment interface.
Allow this IP to access the databases
Allow this IP address to access the SFTP port
Please note, in order to access your databases you have to authorise at least one IP address.
You have not authorised any IP addresses
Add a new IP/masque to your whitelist
There was an error when creating the whitelist.
IP address/mask must be an IPv4 (127.0.0.1 or 127.0.0.0/32)
Allow this IP address/mask to access the database
Allow this IP address/mask to access the SFTP

Deletion of the IP/mask has been registered.
There was an error when deleting the IP/mask.
Edit a new IP/mask for your whitelist
There was an error when editing the whitelist.
Allow this IP address/mask to access the databases
